label: Z-Weather

parameters.label: Wind Speed Action Threshold
parameters.description:
Available Parameters: 0  - Off
			1 - 30 in milliseconds Default = 6 m/s

associations.label: Wind Speed
associations.description: Wind speed is higher than 6 m/s (22 Km/h)

associations.label: End of Dawn
associations.description: At the end of the dawn if it becomes bright

associations.label: End of Dusk
associations.description: At the end of the dusk if it becomes bright

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.
